website_summaries.verdict: A great quality gaming chair that offers a lot of different options for adjusting for ultimate comfort.
pros: Chair swivels a full 360 degrees and tilts anywhere from 90 to 180 degrees with a lock if you don't want to tilt
Also includes adjustable arm rests, a high back to support your head and neck, and lumbar support
cons: The chair is a little difficult to assemble and some of the padding is a little thin

customer_reviews.title: Great chair, but not a real red
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my brother in law for his bday. The only thing that I was bummed about, the red really isn't a red. It's more like an orange. That was kind of disappointing,as his favorite color is red. BUT he did say that he loves the chair and it is comfortable. We were excited because this is his first gaming chair, and it was something we could afford. Next time, we will read the reviews and make sure that the color is an actual red though. Oh and the reason he was wanting a gaming chair was because he needed something that gave him more back support, and he said that this chair definitely gives him that.
customer_reviews.author: BillyJo

customer_reviews.title: Cheap parts, poorly crafted, uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this chair because someone convinced that I should try replacing my standard desk chair with a gaming chair. A quick search produced this one, recommended for its features, so I ordered it. How disappointing. I sat in it one time, then moved it to my basement for use as a spare if I ever have company. It came in so many pieces, and wrapping bubbles that would require half of my day to repack, so I won't even bother trying to get a refund. What a piece of junk. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: I love this chair
customer_reviews.text: I love this chair. It was easy to set up by myself. Only requires an Allen Wrench and the ability to read directions. The material is really smooth and comfortable - has great color. The adjustable armrests are nice (considering my last chair didn't have this feature). The armrests are indented a bit to fit my forearm nicely, which I like. Lumbar pulled is fantastic and has the perfect amount of firmness. The only con is the chair doesn't raise as high as I'd like (depending on the height of the desk being used).
customer_reviews.author: Jake F

customer_reviews.title: Merax doesn't not honor warranty!
customer_reviews.text: The chair broke at a major support rail after only 4 months of use! Merax would not honor the warranty. I did not abuse or misuse the chair, and I'm under the rated weight for the chair. After contacting amazon they are gracious enough to offer a one-time replacement. Thank you, Amazon! I will never buy another Merax product again. Quote~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Dear Nathaniel, Thank you for getting back to us. We are sorry that your order is not in our database. Could you please contact the seller for assistance? Have a nice day. Best regards, Emily ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel Vieira

customer_reviews.title: Quailty is great, wheels are good
customer_reviews.text: It's ok. Quailty is great, wheels are good, very sturdy. Picture is Very deceptive and makes it look like the seat of the chair is 21.7" wide. The actual flat center section of the seat is 14". It is WAY to tight for me and it hurts to sit in. Would have sent it back, but getting the wheels off and the piston out of the seat bracket and legs is near impossible, so i cant even get it in the box.
customer_reviews.author: andy hoffman

customer_reviews.title: I read the negative reviews as well as the good ones. Yes
customer_reviews.text: I read the negative reviews as well as the good ones. Yes, they do not come with instructions but it was not hard to figure out how to assemble. Hardware provided is good quality. Just put them together and it seems well made. All of the features of height adjustment and reclining work very well. Arms have some play in them but that is really not a problem. I got two of them for my kids gaming and will adjust my review if it doesn't work out. As of now, I would recommend this chair.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Laliberte

customer_reviews.title: Easily the most uncomfortable chair I have ever sat in.
customer_reviews.text: It is fairly easy to assemble, but that is pretty much the only positive thing I can say about it. Sitting in this chair for any amount of time is just uncomfortable. The chair is stiff and is angled slightly forward that makes you feel like you will fall off sometimes. The arms are too far apart for me to rest both of my arms on them comfortably (I have the arms screwed in as close as they can and it still isn't close enough for me.) I would avoid this chair at all costs, unless you like wasting money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good chair, but maybe not the most durable
customer_reviews.text: i sit on this chair for many hours a day wasting my life and i can say this is a good chair to put your butt in for way too long. however, the headrest pillow is too tall if youre a shorter person like me (im 5'2") and it hits the back of my head instead of my neck. the leather has started to crack and become indented from sitting after less than a year of use though, so the quality isnt amazing apparently. i loved it but every day it gets more cracked and indented feelsbadman. reclines and is comfy though.
customer_reviews.author: brooke

customer_reviews.title: I wanted it to be a nice, comfortable chair he could game in for hours
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about this. My boyfriend is a gaming snob and when it came to gaming chairs... he had an old office chair but never bought a new one bc though he is snobby about his gaming, he spends his money on his tech not his furniture. I wanted it to be a nice, comfortable chair he could game in for hours. This chair is awesome. He loves the lumbar and head supports, which I was also iffy about. He has fallen asleep in the chair as well. We did assemble it together and... for furniture assembly, it was easy. We love it.
customer_reviews.author: Sable

customer_reviews.title: Not the same product as the good reviews
customer_reviews.text: I bought this chair for my bf last year, and loved it so much I bought another one for myself (May 2020) and it's clearly not the same chair. The old one is on the right, you can see how much more padding and care went into the creation of it, and the new model is on the left...flat, stiff, and not as comfortable to sit in. It's not the worst chair in the world I just want people to know when they're ordering them that they're not as great as the older reviews since they REALLY downgraded and cut-corners with quality. Its hard to tell but the colors aren't as vibrant either
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Nice gaming chair
customer_reviews.text: Nice desk gaming chair that mimics a racing seat. Looks great at my desk and is really comfortable. I could is in this chair all day. I like how it looks like a real racing seat. I am a car guy so I find it cool to have a racing seat in my office. The materials are really nice and the stitching is great with no breaks or rips. The base is nice quality and the chair easily rolls with none of that weird sudden jerk motion you get. Overall impressed with the quality. Great value for the price if you are looking for a sporty office look.
customer_reviews.author: Robotica Industries

customer_reviews.title: Could be a good chair, but the materials are just too weak.
customer_reviews.text: This chair is supposed to be rated for 250lb. I am 200 on a bad day and this chair is breaking down like I am double that. The lift mechanism stopped working, the padding for the seat has completely worn out (to the point where I had to buy a pad), and the arm rests are tearing and falling apart. This chair has great features; it was easy to assemble, it rolls well, and it's rather comfortable, when it's brand new. Its quick deterioration is disappointing, so unless you are buying it for a kid that weighs 75 pounds, stay far far away.
customer_reviews.author: gregoriooo

customer_reviews.title: The chair received in a large box and nicely packed. The assemble was easy to follow and ...
customer_reviews.text: The chair received in a large box and nicely packed. The assemble was easy to follow and assembles with the provided tool. Not too may parts to put together. The price to quality ratio good. The quality of the material was excellent overall. Leather was excellent texture. The wheels and base excellent construction. The chair is a tad oversized for me personally. But I think it good if your 6' or taller. The padding could be better like using memory foam. Really great deal considering Office Dept sells chairs for about the same price for leather wrapped. Cool looking and comfortable chair. Hope it last 5 years.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. M

customer_reviews.title: Best budget gaming chair
customer_reviews.text: I had to research a lot to see what gaming chair I should get. After reading the reviews I finally pulled the trigger and purchased my first gaming chair. Best decision I have made. I used to use an office chair and it is night and day compared to the Merax gaming chair. My friend had a DX Racer chair and was jealous to find out I paid half for the exact same thing. The instructions were a bit unclear but after 20 minutes the chair was easily out together.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this chair as a Christmas present for my son. The plastic part on the seat had a large crack so we prepared to send back for a replacement. Before we sent it back, we received the replacement chair. The replacement chair was also broken in the same spot. So, we had to lug both of these chairs back to UPS. Don't want to try for a 3rd time. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: O Olive

customer_reviews.title: Same quality as sub $100 chairs.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this chair at $150 to replace my $100 amazon gaming chair so i wouldn't have to deal with the armrest bolts digging into my a$$. Nope. Bolts are nearly a half inch too long and stick up through the bottom into the foam seat. I am 155lbs and am too heavy for this chair. Recommended for people less than 100lbs. Do yourself a favor and get the cheapest gaming chair you can find or pay over $200 and maybe you'll get a chair that uses a steel base plate instead of a one made of particle board.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BEST GAME CHAIR OUT THERE FOR THE MONEY
customer_reviews.text: This chair is exactly what my son needed. He plays PROFESSIONAL PS4 and need a comfortable chair. This gaming chair is the best of the best. Very comfortable and adjustable sized on arm rest and height
customer_reviews.author: Casey Schaff

customer_reviews.title: Pass on this one.
customer_reviews.text: First impression...Cheap. Most is metal...so that should be a good thing but then you sit in it. Hard seat...thin piece of foam. And seat is so small. Not sure how I missed that in the description! Hubby is 185 and 5'9...his ass barely fits. I usually read reviews and research before I buy...not sure how I picked this one...? And the lumbar pillow is so uncomfortable. The arm rests are hard plastic and just uncomfortable. Bought one from Walmart at the same price point and it's a lot better. I will update review after a few months of use.
customer_reviews.author: SandraL

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT have the ability to ROCK, in a non metal way.
customer_reviews.text: You know what would have been great before selecting this chair for purchase. An ACTUAL in depth description on the chair. This chair does NOT rock at all. Yes, it has the ability to lean back to a 180 degree, for whatever reason. But this chair, again, DOES NOT ROCK. So annoying that I cant lean back or move around in that way while spending large amounts of time in front of my pc. Other than that, it is a solid chair for its price. Pain to get the bolts in.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: For Readers Like You...
customer_reviews.text: I got a big butt and I cannot lie, this chair cut into my thighs! Haha. I remedied the problem by adding a cushion, otherwise everyone else in the house loves it except for the arms. They're too short and not padded in any way. Extended all the way is still not enough to reach our elbows. Still on the hunt for some cushions for those suckers. If y'all know of some bomb ones, please let us know!
customer_reviews.author: Ally Troyer

customer_reviews.title: Awkaward
customer_reviews.text: This chair is basically just a racing chair with wheels. It doesn't seem like it was meant to be a computer chair. The armrests move every time you lift your hand from them, making an annoying noise every time. I thought maybe something was loose, but both armrests do it, and it just seems to be the armrest just isn't snug to the base and has play. For my right hang to come over to and type with this chair, it feels like I'm reaching 45 degrees over, and it hurts my thyroids.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Blody

customer_reviews.title: Not Recommended
customer_reviews.text: My son loved this chair when he first got it. Over the first couple months, issues with the arms emerged. We contacted the manufacturer and they sent out replacements. Unfortunately they provided similar but not same arms even though we have exact model number. The replacements never fit perfectly and it was just too much trouble to communicate with the manufacturer. Recently, the chair became wobbly and uncomfortable. Time to donate this one and get a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Michael C

customer_reviews.title: Quite Bad
customer_reviews.text: Quite bad, used for quite a while and gave me back problems that I've had to go to the chiropractor for. A regular office chair would be better. The cushioning at the base of mine seemed to maybe be uneven or there just wasn't enough of it. I don't like the lumber support cushion thing its way too big, for me atleast. The headrest cushion is okay but kind of stupid of how it goes on.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Love the adjustment, question the durability
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I ordered a pair of these. She is smaller framed and I am larger but we both equally enjoy the chairs. They are highly adjustable for a range of preferences but my only complaint is that the arm rests do not adjustable inward. If I were less broad in the shoulders, I would find the elbow placement too wide. Also, it was my own fault but I tore the material on the seat in the first week by sitting on a pen the had fallen into the chair. Be mindful, it is NOT as durable as most synthetic fabrics. At the affordable price though, it's what I'd expect.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Excellent chair - really like it
customer_reviews.text: Packing was good, except for one minor detail. No manual. None whatsoever. Searched YouTube and found a couple of videos on how to put together and what do you know? They had a manual to follow! The packer simply forgot to include one on mine. Not good. I had some trouble putting it together, but the videos really helped, by following their actions. Chair, after a week, feels solid and well built. I like it and would recommend it. Just make sure you can take video guidance.
customer_reviews.author: Alexf

customer_reviews.title: Great Chair
customer_reviews.text: I was waiting to give my review on this chair. Now it's been 3 months I have to say this chair is great no complains here at all.
customer_reviews.author: Nebaa21

customer_reviews.title: Customer pretty upset!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 5 months ago and the hydraulics have already broke. I contacted them 4 days ago about the 2 year warranty and they have not responded.. I bought protection plan also but they won’t help either and say I have to get a hold of them first.. so frustrating to spend this much for it to already be broke
customer_reviews.author: Jody

customer_reviews.title: After 1 year of use
customer_reviews.text: Not happy that the chair already has problems with staying up. It's already loosing air and makes you sink to the ground. We liked the chair at first but it's only been one year. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: rdw

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you have some luck
customer_reviews.text: It could be a great chair for all I know. But mine arrived with the right cover broken and was disappointed because many other reviews said this and you could see there was only one layer of padding in a very tight space with no 'wiggle room'. Not sure If I will replace the chair or if the covers are replaceable. Edit: Ordered a replacement, will see if the next one is not broken.
customer_reviews.author: ZFK

customer_reviews.title: Comfy gaming chair - teenager approved
customer_reviews.text: Son loves the chair he received for Christmas. I was pleased will everything except that there were 2 broken pieces. Luckily they weren't structural (a plastic cover on the side of the chair), and was able to be glued in place. Otherwise would have been a 5 star. Son and friends have all spent considerable time in the chair already. Hope it holds up. Will update review in 6 months....
customer_reviews.author: slrincv

customer_reviews.title: Quality, slick chair!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband for Christmas. He was so surprised and pumped! He is a huge gamer, he has built all his own computers so he spends a ton of time in a chair ! The leather seems to be scratch resistant our beagle jumps up there sometimes! It’s extremely comfortable, planning on ordering one for myself eventually!!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Seip

customer_reviews.title: Awesome chair..one small issue
customer_reviews.text: Update**** gas cylinder failed.. after 2.5 years... the chairnisngolding up well other than that.. Awesome chair overall..the only issue I had with the chair is that the preassembled arm rests appeared loose. After further inspection, I discovered that the bolts that attach the arm rest to the brackets were over tightened and stripped out at the factory. I was able to replace the bolts and the arm rests are solid now
customer_reviews.author: Joseph T

customer_reviews.title: No customer support
customer_reviews.text: The chair is nice and pretty comfortable, however in under a year the arm rest started to crumble apart and the gas cylinder does not hold pressure very well and I am frequently sinking while sitting. I have attempted to reach Merax for warranty information and part replacement, as they advertise a 2 year warranty and helpful customer support, but received no response after emailing their prime shop gmail address and going to the Merax website and sending a message via their 'Contact Us' page. For the price, I expected the chair to be in better shape at this point and the customer support is nonexistent.
customer_reviews.author: Kelley Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Great gaming chair!
customer_reviews.text: My husband requested this chair by reading all of the reviews online. I bought it for him for Christmas 2017. It came in a huge box but it was easy to assemble. Excellent quality and looks very nice in our office (I, personally am not crazy about the red and wish there were an all black option but it still looks great). Haven't had it a year yet but he uses it every day and loves it. No complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Its alright...
customer_reviews.text: Bleh, have had it for about 4-5 months. I mean.. I guess its cool. I guess it depends how much you weigh? and how often you sit, and the duration? lol. Im about 185lbs the chair is great, but this stupid a bar to adjust the angle, ALWAYS, and I mean ALWAYS pulls out by itself and sends me flying forward. but that may just be me, overall I do like the chair.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Seijo

customer_reviews.title: Great chair but was really sad that mine came with ...
customer_reviews.text: Great chair but was really sad that mine came with damage to one of the armrests. You can hide the aesthetic easily but the arm rest is forever a little wobbly and I was super disappointed as this was a birthday present. My brother didn't mind too much, but I felt awful about it. Hopefully, I just got a bad one and this isn't how they normally come. On the bright side it did come earlier than anticipated.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: It enjoy the chair
customer_reviews.text: It enjoy the chair, but the instructions given with it are subpar an the neck/lumbar pillows that come with it are garbo. Not comfortable at all and put my neck and back out. The tilt rock is really minimal, like it basically doesn't rock unless you really push. The chair itself is a 4 star, but drops to a 3 because of all these little inconveniences.
customer_reviews.author: Brehn Erskine

customer_reviews.title: Ok chair at an decent price but not the best
customer_reviews.text: Edit: the chair squeaks like crazy! Been 6 months since purchased. It’s like every part of this chair makes some kind of noise Pretty easy and straight forward assembly. Chair is comfortable and supportive. I like the multiple adjustments that can be made. Very quality chair for the price. Not made for the wider of rear ends.
customer_reviews.author: Derrick Hays

customer_reviews.title: Subpar
customer_reviews.text: Honestly all these "gaming" chairs aren't that great for pretty much anything. There isn't much positive to say about this chair other than it is exactly like a DXracer just rebranded and cheaper. If you want a good chair, take the time and spend the money on a better chair out there.
customer_reviews.author: TheShawn

customer_reviews.title: Made me the greatest Aunt ever
customer_reviews.text: My nephew is a hard core gamer and was in need of a new chair (since he lives in it) So last Christmas I read a bunch or reviews and this one was what sounded like had hit all the requirements. He loved loved loved it. Can't stop thanking me for it. Very sturdily built, good covering, and a very sturdy base.
customer_reviews.author: zenita campbell

customer_reviews.title: Cheap frame and metal parts!
customer_reviews.text: Review bought October 2018 5’9 200lbs Not well made. Welds broke on the frame on the back piece. Had to replace tilt mechanism. Thin material and not soft at all. Thin seat, can feel frame when I sit. I have spent countless hours in this chair. It is ergonomic so you can spend quite a bit of time in this chair and feel like it didn’t do too much damage to your body. I would definitely want more cushion on seat area and better quality. I’m buying a new chair today. This will NOT be the one I buy.
customer_reviews.author: nickg1826

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy & Durable
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son for gaming. He has drug this thing up and down stairs so many times, and it's still strong as when we first put it together. I don't know what the weight limit says, but this stands up against my 6'3" 300 lb husband just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Kopca

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality for Price
customer_reviews.text: Shipped and arrived really fast. The quality of the chair is really nice. Assembly was a bit difficult, especially getting the wheels in. It took about 45 mins to 1 hour. Once assembled, it is one of my favorite purchases. I'm 6'5", 200lbs. It reclines, it moves on carpet well, it also rocks if you like to rock back and forth. The arm rests don't move, which isn't a problem for me. The pillows it came with are okay. And the thing that raises or lowers the seat doesn't really raise/lower it that much. But overall it is really good for the cost and is extremely comfortable to sit in for hours when doing homework or gaming!
customer_reviews.author: Moose

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Item received as described. Well packed. Was replacement for a standard computer chair. UPGRADE!!!! Bought a red one for my fiance and he loves it. Very Comfortable. Pillows are nice. One screw the hole for the Allen wench was not bored out all the way but still could install.
customer_reviews.author: KixyKat

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable for the first 8 months
customer_reviews.text: After 8 months, the ram has failed. The chair now drops randomly throughout the day. I am well within the weight capacity and I do not abuse the chair. The lumbar pillow is now also flat. I use this as an office chair and 40+ hours in it weekly. I enjoy the nap capacity and ability to lay out and stretch when needed. I just wish it would have last longer.
customer_reviews.author: B Gal

customer_reviews.title: 10 Months Later: Buyer's Remorse :(
customer_reviews.text: The chair has too much give, like it wobbles in ways it should not. Also for a chair this price I would have expected seat tilt adjustments, but that's my bad for not being more aware during purchase, I just took it for granted. If I had it to do over, I would have gone with something else. Even a normal office chair would be more comfortable than this. Edit: 22 months later, the hydrologics gave out. I'm 175lbs and treated the chair very well. Such a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Paul O

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 2 years then fell apart
customer_reviews.text: Well it made it 2 years, im a normal sized guy, not overweight, and this chair lasted 2 years before it fell apart on me. The cylinder failed after about a year, and the arm rests literally flaked off over the past 8 months or so. I definitely wont be buying again, but if you have light use of this chair it may work for you. ( i used it for multiple hours every day )
customer_reviews.author: Leo

customer_reviews.title: better then mine
customer_reviews.text: so i bought two chairs and they were okay, a little uncomfortable but then bought this one for my boyfriend and well its mine now, the seat is fairly wide which makes it so the sides are not squishing your hips and making em sore. the quality over all is good.
customer_reviews.author: Zepherea

customer_reviews.title: Gimmick
customer_reviews.text: Was very uncomfortable. I am 6 ft tall and weigh 210 and the sides of the chair dug into my hips. The arm rests are very awkward and not long enough. Used it for an hour and went back to my traditional office chair with padded arm rest. Too many of these companies are marketing these "racing seat" chairs as gaming chairs and put little to no effort to adding actual quality. It's all the same base, swivel, and even wheels as all the other "gaming chairs." Just stick with a regular office chair and your back and wrists will thank you
customer_reviews.author: Tyler B.

customer_reviews.title: Quality chair, budget price.
customer_reviews.text: Easy assembly, nice materials. Perfect gaming or even office chair that looks like it should cost way more. Very comfortable! Even the small added pillows are well thought out, instead of just a gimmick. Would recommend and am planning on buying two more.
customer_reviews.author: Jana L. Perry

customer_reviews.title: Seemed good at first, but then...
customer_reviews.text: I've been using the chair for a little less then a year, and yet I'm beginning to have issues already. The piston that raises and lowers the chair will randomly release dropping me down. It is sometimes days in between it doing this or sometimes only hours. The inability to adjust the arm rests has been annoying and the fact that they constantly are coming loose making me bust out an alan wrench to fix them is very very annoying. All in all I will be replacing the chair without even getting a full 12 months from it. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did not arrived as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Chair is okay, but it does not look anything like I thought I was buying. I received a normal neck pillow and not the advertised U-shaped pillow, which is what I ordered. Furthermore, the chair came cracked in two places and I had to make my own pilot hole to mount the right armrest. Beware that you're most likely not going to get what you're expecting
customer_reviews.author: Zach Nippert

customer_reviews.title: Gaming Chair for Teenage Son
customer_reviews.text: Ordered in bright blue/ black. Used several months now. Very durable and comfortable according to my son. He loves the way it reclines also. Took 20min for us to put together. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Customer Service at Merax
customer_reviews.text: Less than a year later the chair doesn't move up or down. After three e-mails to Amazon warranties, they finally responded and directed me to Merax. I've been playing email tag with them for three weeks. I've provided my Amazon receipt on two occasions and pictures of the chair. I will write an update, if it ever gets resolved.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Borras

customer_reviews.title: Made of dangerous chineseium
customer_reviews.text: Owned this chair for alittle under a year and a half and the back broke. I'm medium size guy and have never had a back break on a chair before. I decided to try to fix it. After opening up the back I found the culprit was a bent right angle piece of steal that attaches the back frame to the base. It was bent pretty badly, and because the steel was so hard it's clear it came from the factory that way and then loosely welded into the frame. Fortunately I wasn't hurt, but I'd stay away from this one.
customer_reviews.author: Evan Yandle

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable Chair...
customer_reviews.text: This chair is very comfortable and was a great bargain for the price. It was a headache to put together, because the bolts for the bottom mount of the chair were not aligned, but other than that I simply love it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Lived up to expectation
customer_reviews.text: It's easy to put together, comes with everything it needs, is good quality, and comfortable to sit in every which way for long periods of time. I am very small and skinny and like to sit with my knees to my chest, so I needed a chair that wasn't hard on my bony butt and this works for long term gaming. I recommend it if you're looking for a comfortable gaming chair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pull up a stool
customer_reviews.text: Awesome chair. Easy assembly. Quality feels good. My son uses it about 6 hours a day for the last three months. He has no complaints and won’t let me try use it
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Not a good buy
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. It is not sturdy. Bought it barely 8 months ago and it is already broken to the point that it cannot be used. Can’t return it either because it is past return date. DO NOT RECOMMEND AT ALL
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Chair but screws were cheap and already stripped out of the box
customer_reviews.text: I liked the chair overall, but the screws it came with were very cheap. My left armrest was loose after I put together the chair. When I made an effort to tighten the armrest to the metal mount it would not tighten because the screws were completely stripped. The armrests come pre-assembled, thus the screws in the armrest were pre-stripped. I really wanted to like the chair, as the base and back were quite comfortable, but when using such cheap screws this chair simply does not hold up and is beginning to fall apart less than a month into ownership.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie K.

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this chair for Christmas for my son. For nearly $200, I would expect it to last more than 6 weeks! The part that connects to the bottom of the chair broke after 6 weeks causing the chair to lean to one side! Don't waste your money on this one!!! Despicable
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Kock

customer_reviews.title: Great, but can’t raise or lower chair.
customer_reviews.text: My 13 year old son loves the chair, however the mechanism attached to the lever that raises and lowers the chair, doesn’t work. Once you lower it, it clicks out of place and the top has to be taken off fixed, and then not maneuvered.
customer_reviews.author: Alesa Hefner

customer_reviews.title: Top bolts would not thread into the base
customer_reviews.text: We bought two of these for Christmas. One was fine. The other was damaged...2 of the top bolts would not thread into the base. We reached out to the seller, and exchanged emails, and then they stopped responding.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: One year in, still a great chair.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this chair for a year now, and it has the same comfort level and everything to this day. Never had a problem with the lean back or the lock bar, the arm rests or any other part of the chair. For a lower priced chair compared to the DXRacer, which I've never tested or tried out, I am very satisfied with this chair. For reference, I am 6'1", around 220lbs-230lbs, and use this chair at least 2-3 hours daily, some weekends can be spent the entire day in the chair, so it's had plenty of time to get jacked up, but it's held strong.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, not very durable.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Instructions were a little unclear, but it got set up in time. Personally, the lower pillow is useless (or maybe I don't understand how it's supposed to be used). This is not a very durable chair, and some of the stitching started to come apart after about 9 months. For the price, though, it's an amazing chair.
customer_reviews.author: Cola Henrique

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but not durable
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this chair when I first got it, but the chair will fall appart rather easily. After 2 months the gas cylinder went bad, no big deal I replaced it, then another month later the base plate began to crack so I replaced that and after 6 months the tubing in the back piece broke so the chair has no back. WIsh I could buy a new back for it because I really liked the chairs comfort and design, but it isn't durable.
customer_reviews.author: Jarred Jeserich

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this chair
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, the chair was AMAZING for about 6 months, then started to fall apart. Like literally all the stuff is peeling off, and the armrests are going peeling and becoming uncomfortable. I actually had it replaced once, and then it just started to fall apart even faster.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Alan glander

customer_reviews.title: Extremely uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Horrible!! It's the most uncomfortable chair I've ever sat on. Caused lower back and hip pain. I don't know how people could sit on there. I'd rather use a plastic chair.
customer_reviews.author: MadhuriKC

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality-Poor Assembly Instructions
customer_reviews.text: After reading 54 reviews on this chair I would agree with the assessments, The overall parts quality is great. Instructions on putting it together were vague and no direction on attaching the lumbar support.
customer_reviews.author: Tim F

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Chair so far after 2 years of ownership... Already need a new one. Support is completely gone and the chair is just outright uncomfortable at this point. Spend the extra money or use the same amount of money for an ordinary, but comfortable chair.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua M Jarvis

customer_reviews.title: Very weak at the weight limit
customer_reviews.text: Product seemed ok. But the inner frame started to bend. I'm about at the weight limit, I was afraid this might happen but usually theres always a buffer of a few pounds. It lasted me about 5 months and then it broke
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the hype.
customer_reviews.text: I'm sorry, this chair is kind of cheap junk - I owned an ergonomic chair previously which lasted >10 years. This one is terribly uncomfortable in comparison and very cheaply made - lumbar bag is too big so there is no position it actually works in and everything about the build is well, cheap. I'm flabbergasted as to how it is getting good reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Karbo

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loves it...
customer_reviews.text: Grandson loves it. I chose it carefully for adjustability and a color scheme that matches some sort of video game he likes. It seems sturdy and well worth the price. We are very happy with this purchase. There was no warranty document in the carton, but I hope we won't need one.
customer_reviews.author: NBT

customer_reviews.title: Great DX Racer alternative
customer_reviews.text: Not bad for the price. Had for 3 months and some squeaks and wiggles have appeared but still an all around sturdy and comfortable chair. I’m a big guy(6”3 250lbs) and have no issue sitting in the chair for 5+ hours a day.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Kowalski

customer_reviews.title: Comfy n stylish
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my grandson’s room for his gaming. He plays Fortnite and needed a chair. Comfy n stylish chair.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan's Grandma

customer_reviews.title: Cushion soo thin the bolts are poking through.
customer_reviews.text: The seat cushion is soo thin that the 4 main bolts used to bolt it to the frame are poking through. They extrude so much that my leg is going numb after sitting in it for only an hr or so. This is supposed to be a GAMING Chair... I wanted to see if I could stand it or it it got more comfortable after being broken in. It just made things worse. I HOPE I can get a refund of some type. It has only been 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Isaacs

customer_reviews.title: Hydrolic DOES NOT work
customer_reviews.text: This chair is amazing per my gaming son, EXCEPT, the chair has never worked to adjust height. I started calling the manufacturer immediately to no returned calls. I should have exchanged it right away here on amazon, but naturally now I am too late. This chair was bought for a Christmas present and while the overall chair is cool, not having the ability to adjust the height or easily change hydrolics (which should have been replaced) is a pain.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Eltrich

customer_reviews.title: Great chair
customer_reviews.text: Excellent chair, great for long gaming sessions and provides excellent support even for my 6'5" son.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

customer_reviews.title: Great gaming chair!
customer_reviews.text: My 16 yr old put it together by self. He loves it! We’ve had it for over 6months and its still in perfect condition. Had a smell when we first got it so we put it on the porch to air out for a few days. Smell is gone now.
customer_reviews.author: sara

customer_reviews.title: Great chair for mid range price.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and feels very sturdy. Armrests adjust both up and down and left to right slightly with bolt placement. Overall a comfortable chair with or without the headrest and lumbar pillows.
customer_reviews.author: Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Overall very good chair.
customer_reviews.text: Overall very good chair. I only have to very minor problems with it. The first is that the plastic clip cracked for the pillow but it still kind of works if you clip it slowly. The other problem I had was that if you don't weigh a lot it will not go up and down. If you are fully grown it works great but if your a kid or teen it might not go up and down. But it is very comfy and great for gaming.
customer_reviews.author: DO NOT GET THIS APP!

customer_reviews.title: This chair is beautiful, however, for long hours on the computer is not supporting your back.
customer_reviews.text: This chair is beautiful, however, for long hours on the computer is not supporting your back.
customer_reviews.author: Rosmery M Then

customer_reviews.title: Over priced pretty looking junk
customer_reviews.text: Product was damaged on the outer trims when i received it. The chair is pretty uncomfortable. The piston already gave out after a few months. When i can get it to stay, the chair wobbles like it's sitting on a ball at the max height. The seat isn't very soft. the back cushion things make it uncomfortable all the time, if I take them off, it's still uncomfortable. Just very disappointed i spent this much and it's worse than a cheap walmart chair
customer_reviews.author: James Gilliam

customer_reviews.title: Not built to last
customer_reviews.text: Fabric on the chair must be inferior quality as well as the plastic for the arms on the chair. my chair shipped with several rips, and pieces of the arms broken off. Not impressed i should have bought a 100$ chair instead.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Decent chair for price
customer_reviews.text: Overall the chair is pretty good compared to others with similar price tags. I've had mine for almost a year and it no longer maintains its elevation and constantly sinks down to its lowest level. The padding has worn thin already and offers less comfort than originally. I expect these things to happen from general use, but not within a year of purchase, that is disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Jason W.

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and it looks cool, but the padding is thin and uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: James Boone

customer_reviews.title: Still holds up solid and not a single issue and still like brand new
customer_reviews.text: Had this chair for about a year now. Still holds up solid and not a single issue and still like brand new. I'm constantly using it being that I do a lot of work from my desktop. Would definitely recommend for someone who needs an office or gaming chair for comfort and to last a long time. 11/25/2018 - Still a great chair, sitting in it now and still comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Kane Lehning

customer_reviews.title: Good Chair Until....
customer_reviews.text: The chair was really nice when I first got it and seemed like it was going to hold up nicely. After a year of use, the seam ripped and it was unable to be repaired. Could not return nor could I find any warranty information from the manufacturer. Although this one looks nicer than most other chairs, I would find one with a more reputable manufacturer, as Merax continued to ignore my pleas for help.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Goodman

customer_reviews.title: Best for the money chair
customer_reviews.text: Great chair for the price, the instructions could be written way better but in all honesty I looked at them one time, everything was self explanatory, so far so good, I'll update with any issues or anything else
customer_reviews.author: MANZANO

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Chair! Recommend It!
customer_reviews.text: This chair is so great, and this is coming from a 13 right now writing this, it is very stable and very nice and clean chair. I little touch to put together but I'm 13 and did it alone and if u get maybe another person to help you'll get it done and no time. It leans all the way back and would not break. Hope you get it!
customer_reviews.author: Keisha DeZube

customer_reviews.title: Within four months, the chair broke.
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my son for gaming. Within four months, it broke at the back. The break also damaged the seat when the parts separated. I contacted the manufacturer sending photos and a screenshot of my Amazon order. They refused to do anything saying Amazon is not an authorized dealer. Amazon never responded either. I would give it a zero if possible.
customer_reviews.author: Beth M.

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy. Does not honor 2 year warranty. Don’t put the strain on Amazon they shouldn’t have to refund you for this product while it’s still under manufacturer warranty. My chair lowers itself randomly by itself without me even pressing the lever.
customer_reviews.author: Kell

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this chair for our son as a gift. Within the first 9 months the wheel broke off. Then the faux leather material started falling apart. Then the foam on the handles. Would not recommend. Poor quality overall. I expect more from a $200 chair.
customer_reviews.author: wcccabe6

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality Control
customer_reviews.text: The drilled holes to attach the seat bracket didn't line-up. So out of 4 bolts, 2 were just barely started in the holes. Also, some stitching was crooked and poorly done. That shows poor quality control. I made it work but it isn't solid and I hope it will last a year. I will then replace it with a better quality chair from a different company.
customer_reviews.author: Michael T Drake

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy This Chair
customer_reviews.text: After 5 months of occasional use (3-5 times per week for 1-3 hours per session) the bolts on the bottom have completely worn through and are poking through the fabric. Support won't do anything since it's beyond the return period. I'm just trying to help others avoid the same mistake, as I spent almost $200 on a chair I have to put a firm pillow on now to sit on. Don't buy this chair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great back support and the bucket seat and back hold you in place but after hours of gaming you come to realize that the padding on the seat could be A LOT better, but for the price, this cannot be beaten. Also the blue looks better in person and cannot be done justice through pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Your ass will fall asleep 💤
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE! You will get lower back problems due to the fact it has no lumbar support and the padding is bad and it will start making noise the structure is weak.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: purchased april 2017-all the issues as of july 2019
customer_reviews.text: Bottom left side support bracket just broke. Obnoxious squeak on the left side. Will not stay in a reclined position internal mechanics are ruined I suppose. Elbow supports wiggled lose in the first 3 months of ownership.
customer_reviews.author: Duane H

customer_reviews.title: The chair came real quick after ordering and was pretty easy to put together myself
customer_reviews.text: The chair came real quick after ordering and was pretty easy to put together myself. It's very comfortable as I use it for my office chair at my work and everyone always asks where I got it wanting one for them selves. (very comfortable with the special pillows)
customer_reviews.author: Christine Mack

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Shipping takes a week, but the product finally came in all good condition, no part is missing. Comes with tool for installing, not hard to set up but does take some time. Soft enough for both gaming and daily working usage. Does have some odor, need some time to let it clear out.
customer_reviews.author: Paul S.

product_meta.title: Merax Gaming High Back Computer Ergonomic Design Racing Chair, 27.6"L X 27.6"D X 52.4"H, Red
product_meta.description: Color:RedThis ergonomic high back office chair from Merax extends the full length of the back with support for the shoulders, head, and neck. Our chairs are crafted to perfection and designed to the bodies natural shape, you will find complete comfort with its high quality PU leather and padded seat. Top this with top quality furniture PU leather and a fantastic executive look. Size: back size: 25. 2&Times; 33. 1 inch seat size: 21. 6&Times; 20. 1inchAdjustable seat Height: 17. 7-20. 9 inch item weight: 55 lbs. Max load: 250 lbs. Notice: items may slightly differ from photo in terms of color due to the lighting during photo shooting or your monitor's display. If you have any question about the privacy policy, including returns, refunds, cancellations, service time, etc.
feature_bullets: √ HIGH QUALITY SUPERIOR COMFORT: Our chairs are crafted to perfection and designed to the bodies natural shape with an ergonomic build complete with deep padded cushioning throughout the chair length for soft natural comfort during long hours of sitting

√ LEADING GAMING CHAIR DESIGN: Soft upholstered wear resistant PU leather is integrated with our Merax signature bold racing stripe design against a midnight black backdrop making it the center of attention in any gaming or office set-up

√ MULTI-FUNCTIONAL BUILD: Manufactured with complete 360 degree swiveling to easily navigate around your desk, back tilt function allowing you to lean back comfortably and an upright lock function to prevent tilting when not desired

√ SYSTEM YOU CAN RELY ON: Fully adjustable armrests and height to fit your size, adjust the chair back anywhere between 90 degrees in an upright position to 180 degrees laying completely flat for napping. Built-in heavy duty gas lift and strong base castors holds loads up to 250 lbs

√ COSTOMER SERVICE: Our products are backed by 2 year warranty so for any reason you are not completely satisfied, our helpful, prompt and friendly Customer Service specialists are at your disposal. Customer Service Email：primeshopro1@gmail.com

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars472 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
